//Description Book your favorite establishment for your meetings or a soccer field to have fun with friends! Receive instant notifications about your reservations, don\'t miss your commitments! MyLocalBooking the application for the complete management of your reservations, directly from your smartphone Don\'t worry about online payments visa ATM or credit card, payments are handled in person Your establishment was successfully added! Click anywhere to go back to your home Se devi testare una funzionalità da questo menù e l\'app crasha/fallisce, clicca sui pulsanti in fondo e visita una delle home! Se con una fallisce, prova con l\'altra
